stories.text: E.g. like how jquery might have influenced document.querySelector, has popular UI programming patterns nowadays like React influenced web standards anyway to make it possible to use some of its good ideas without dependencies in the future? Does stuff like customElements count?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do popular UI programming ideas like React influence new web standards?

stories.text:
The purpose of NATO was to to provide collective security for Europe against the Soviet Union. Now the Soviet Union is gone and unlikely to be re-created.

Putin is beating the war drums b/c he views NATO as a threat. Given Russia's historical fears (some might say "paranoia") about possible invasion, I do not understand why NATO is fiddling around in the Ukraine.

Is there justification for the US remaining in NATO?
stories.title: Ask HN: Should US Leave NATO?

stories.text: We are building a better way to connect co-founders. You can now search for a co-founder who is interested in solving the same challenge as you are. By posting about your project you can get feedback from other founders, create hype around your product, and find the most suitable co-founder. Join early and be part of this awesome community of founders: www.peersuit.com
stories.title: Are you still looking for a co-founder?
